subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Quebec has a tough time developing its elite young hockey players for the N.H.L., and it is time to do something about it, says the Montreal Canadiens’ president, Pierre Boivin.
snippet: Quebec has a tough time developing its elite young hockey players for the N.H.L., and it is time to do something about it, says the Montreal Canadiens’ president, Pierre Boivin.
